result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Montrell L. Stinson

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Atty Bauer appears on behalf of deft. Parties discuss case and are awaiting outcome of revocation hearing in another matter. Dates removed. STC set.
Status conference scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Pre-trial conference on September 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Final pre-trial on October 31, 2022 at 08:50 am.
Jury status hearing on November 16, 2022 at 09:20 am.
Jury Trial on December 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

No contact with victim(s): M.J.M. or J.R.P.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (3) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Amanda.

PO HOLD.

Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
